actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend section 1903 of the Social Security Act to remove limits on payments for skilled nursing homes and intermediate care facilities.

summary.text: Removes the limitations on payments for skilled nursing homes and intermediate care facilities under title XIX (Medicaid) of the Social Security Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 1903 of the Social Security Act to remove limits on payments for skilled nursing homes and intermediate care facilities.
